casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Randy Lynn ATKINS. No. 9A94-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 24, 2006. Sandra Smith, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*837The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of April 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Certiorari Petition:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of April 2006."
